ice.title: ICE & SOS

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.desc: Zero tracking. HTTPS everywhere. Works offline.

offline.title: Offline Mode
offline.desc: Life‑saving access with no signal. Your card is stored on your device.

always.heading: Always accessible
always.body: Wear it or stick it: wristbands, keychains, stickers, or a phone widget — worldwide.
always.note: Free to use: print your own stickers or use any luggage/ID tag. We only charge for optional accessories later.

kids.heading: ANERITA for kids
kids.body: Child‑friendly bands and tags for school, trips, and peace of mind.

identify.heading: Identification, your way
identify.body: Choose the form that suits your lifestyle.

1.title: 1. Create your card
1.body: Add allergies, conditions, meds, and ICE contacts. Everything lives securely on your device.

2.title: 2. Link your tag
2.body: Connect a wristband, keychain, sticker or widget. A quick scan shows your info instantly.

3.title: 3. Share in seconds
3.body: ANERITA displays and voices the essentials so responders act faster — even offline.

q1.q: Does it work without the internet?
q1.a: Yes. Your emergency card is stored locally and can be displayed and spoken offline.

q2.a: We do not track you. Your data is encrypted and stays on your device unless you choose to share it.

q3.a: Absolutely — a simple scan opens your card; big text + audio highlight the critical details.
